emuInput.TitMainTitle: Centenarian Lucy Slater grinding coffee in her kitchen, Ben Avon
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 18, 1953, pg. 2, reads: "Has seen 100 years - Mrs. Lucy Slater of Ben Avon still used the coffee grinder she has had for more than seventy-five years. She prepared her own meals and is really independent."
